category.name: Administration.Access Manager
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_set_current_project
preference.preference_description: Determines whether the project saved in the previous Teamcenter session for a particular user is set as the current project in a new session for the same user. Valid values are: * true: The project saved in the previous Teamcenter session is set as the current project in the new Teamcenter session. This is the default value. * false: The project saved in the previous Teamcenter session is not set as the current project in the new Teamcenter session.
